title: A Brief information about our company
main_text_p_1: Travel company “AAA-Group” will provide you with a decent and comfortable stay in any corner of Uzbekistan, at the most prestigious resorts with a full range of services and the highest service. Travel company “AAA-Group” offers you the following types of recreation: Sightseeing tours: You can visit and see the sights of the cities of Uzbekistan: Tashkent, Samarkand, Bukhara, Khiva, Termez.
main_text_p_2: With us you can issue a ticket to any tourist center in Uzbekistan. Our goal is to provide quality rest to our clients. “AAA-Group” provides only reliable, verified information to its customers, and works only with verified and reliable operators. We employ highly qualified, professional managers, so we guarantee the high quality of your holiday. You relax - we work for you!
